snippet: Two brothers who had been hauling Apple computers destined for New Jersey public school students had claimed the shipment had been stolen from them in Yorktown, N.Y.
abstract: Brothers Anton and Gjon Saljanin, Ujka Vulaj and Carlos Caceres are arrested and charged in connection with theft of over $1 million worth of Apple laptop computers from truck in Yonkers, NY,  bound for delivery to New Jersey high schools.
lead_paragraph: Two brothers who had been hauling Apple computers destined for New Jersey public school students had claimed the shipment had been stolen from them in Yorktown, N.Y.

headline.main: A $1 Million Laptop Theft, and a Story Prosecutors Say Did Not Add Up
headline.print_headline: $1 Million Laptop Theft, and Story Prosecutors Say Did Not Add Up
